SEARCH
Package functional.utilities

Class ReporterUtilities

java.lang.Object
functional.utilities.ReporterUtilities
public class ReporterUtilities extends Object
This class provides utility methods for reporting in a testing framework. It includes functionalities for updating test status, logging messages, and executing actions with logging. It integrates with the Allure reporting framework and Log4j for logging.

      public ReporterUtilities()

  • Method Details

    • updateTestStatus

      public static void updateTestStatus(io.qameta.allure.model.Status status)
      Updates the test status in the Allure report and takes a screenshot. Logs the test status using Log4j. If the test status is not 'PASSED', it logs as info, otherwise, it logs as an error.
      Parameters:
      status - The status of the test (e.g., PASSED, FAILED, SKIPPED, etc.) from Allure's Status enum.

    • log

      @Step("{0}") public static <T> T log(String message, Callable<T> action)
      Logs a message and executes a Callable action, returning the result of the action. If an exception occurs during the execution of the action, it logs the error and prints the stack trace.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the result returned by the action.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to log before executing the action.
      action - The action to be executed.
      Returns:
      The result of the Callable action.

    • log

      @Step("{0}") public static void log(String message, Runnable action)
      Logs a message and executes a Runnable action. If an exception occurs during the execution, it logs the error.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to log before executing the action.
      action - The action to be executed.

    • log

      @Step("{0}") public static void log(String message)
      Logs a message at the info level.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to log.
